input_text:
Subject: You're Invited: Annual Product Launch Event

Hi Team,

Join us for our Annual Product Launch Event!

Date: Friday, April 12th, 2025
Time: 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM Pacific Time
Location: The Grand Ballroom at Hyatt Regency, 5 Embarcadero Center, San Francisco, CA 94111
Virtual option: https://stream.company.io/product-launch-2025

Agenda:
- 2:00 PM: Registration and Welcome Reception
- 2:30 PM: CEO Keynote by Amanda Rodriguez
- 3:15 PM: Product Demos and Breakout Sessions
- 4:15 PM: Panel Q&A with Product Team
- 4:45 PM: Networking and Cocktail Hour

Please RSVP by April 5th to events@company.io. Space limited to 300 in-person attendees.

Dress code: Business casual
Parking: Valet parking available

Best regards,
Maria Chen
VP of Marketing
maria.chen@company.io
(415) 555-7890

expected_json.special_instructions: Business casual dress code. Valet parking available.
